name: Casa Magna - Corojo - Churchill
additionalNotes: Gratify your appetite for the mouthwatering spices an authentic Corojo wrapper delivers with the esteemed, 93-rated Casa Magna brand. As a former ‘#1 Cigar of the Year’ award-winner, cigar-maker Manolo Quesada crafts Casa Magna for the masses. Extraordinary discounts accompany a blend patiently made from Dominican binder and filler tobaccos beneath a succulent Corojo leaf. A medium to full-bodied profile of cayenne, wood and sweetened coffee showers the palate with rich, complex flavor while peppery aromas fill the room.
